description.full: Single Player, Live Multiplayer 1-2, HD (High Definition). Rediscover the arcade classic game CYBERBALL 2072 on Xbox Live. Call the plays that will get your robotic team down field to a touchdown to win. But keep your eye on the ball to make sure it doesn't go critical before you can score. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.
description.short: Touchdown! Rediscover the arcade classic game CYBERBALL 2072 on Xbox Live. Call the plays that will get your robotic team to a touchdown but keep your eye on the ball to make sure it doesn't go critical.
